text: The Entity is a 1982 American psychological horror movie directed by Sidney J. Furie and was based on the 1978 novel of the same name by Frank De Felitta. It stars Barbara Hershey, Ron Silver, David Labiosa, George Coe, Alex Rocco, Margaret Blye, Allan Rich and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 horror movies Category:1980s psychological movies Category:American psychological movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney J. Furie Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: The Entity
